alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 26 at 6:45AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT WEBER...CACHE...EASTERN BOX ELDER...SALT LAKE...DAVIS...WEST CENTRAL MORGAN...NORTHWESTERN UTAH AND EASTERN TOOELE COUNTIES... At 644 AM MST...A snow squall was along a line extending from near Plymouth to 13 miles southwest of Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway to 8 miles west of Dugway English Village...and moving east at 40 mph. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Sandy, Ogden, Layton, Logan, Murray, Bountiful, Tooele, Farmington, Brigham City, Grantsville, Tremonton, Hill Air Force Base, Dugway English Village, Cache, West Jordan, Taylorsville, South Jordan and Lehi. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 284 and 399. Interstate 84 between mile markers 32 and 100. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 78 and 127. US Route 89 between mile markers 459 and 487. * strong winds in excess of 45 mph are possible with this squall. * visibilities will drop quickly to less than a quarter mile in this squall. * sudden and brief snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour are possible in this squall. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
